name: Detective Time (itch) (Mattie)
description: Play as a detective hot on the trail of a criminal you’ve been chasing for years. There have been two cases similar to this one, and with the help of a special watch, you can travel back in time to check out the past crime scenes. The string that ties them all together, all back to this one criminal, is the specific theme that denotes this character’s figure in this film noir-style reality. When this killer strikes, a specific sting plays every time. Walk through three crime scenes: one from a year ago, one from two years ago, and one from the present day, to stop the killer this time before it’s too late. As you walk around the scenes, the criminal’s theme will gradually speed up, and when you’re in view of a clue, the sting will play, letting you know what to look out for on the day of the crime.
